org.atmosphere.wasync

Interface Future

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Future<Socket>

    public interface Future
extends Future<Socket>
    An internal Future implementation used by Transport to notify Socket when the transport has connected and available.
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand
